channel.title: Fixture Monkey on
channel.description: Recent content in Fixture Monkey on

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: sectionStart v.1.0.18 # Fix SimpleValueJqwikPlugin mismatching order with constructor and field. sectionEnd sectionStart v.1.0.17 # Modify the way a value class is used to output arbitrary value. Fix sealedInterface set not working after thenApply. Add supporting Supplier type. Add a new Plugin SimpleValueJqwikPlugin for beginners, it provides a readable String, limited scope of Number and Date. It can customize them as well. sectionEnd sectionStart v.1.0.16 # Add resolve the candidate concrete type of container type.
